title: Johnny Manziel returns, Steelers in first-round QB mix, OBJ rumors (Football 04/09)
description:
Ryan Wilson joins Will Brinson to break down the latest NFL news and notes, including Johnny Manziel's shaky appearance at his spring league game, whether Odell Beckham could still be traded or if the rumors are dying down, if the Steelers are interested in drafting a quarterback in the first round, if the Eagles should be worried about Carson Wentz' long-term health, whether the Rams or Vikings are a more trustworthy NFC contender and how much the Thomas Davis suspension will affect the Panthers chances to win the NFC South.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
